${ModID}:LayeredDefenses.NAME: Layered Defenses
${ModID}:LayeredDefenses.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card type in your hand.

${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.NAME: Preemptive Strike
${ModID}:PreemptiveStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, deal !D! damage again.

${ModID}:PlasmaShield.NAME: Plasma Shield
${ModID}:PlasmaShield.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block if you have Plasma. NL Channel !${ModID}:m2! Plasma.

${ModID}:Enrage.NAME: Enrage
${ModID}:Enrage.DESCRIPTION: Discard !${ModID}:m2! cards. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Enter ${ModID}:Aggression.

${ModID}:Whispers.NAME: Whispers
${ModID}:Whispers.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a *Dazed to your hand.

${ModID}:Replenish.NAME: Replenish
${ModID}:Replenish.DESCRIPTION: Put two cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Replenish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put two cards from your discard pile into your hand.

${ModID}:LesserHex.NAME: Lesser Hex
${ModID}:LesserHex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Add a *Greater Hex to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:LesserHex.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Add a *Greater Hex+ to your discard pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:GreaterHex.NAME: Greater Hex
${ModID}:GreaterHex.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Conjuration.NAME: Conjuration
${ModID}:Conjuration.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL Play and Exhaust it.
${ModID}:Conjuration.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL Play it.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: There are no cards in my draw pile.

${ModID}:RareStrike.NAME: Rare Strike
${ModID}:RareStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your *Rares.
